abstract: Gennadiy Gatilov, deputy Russian foreign minister, rejects calls from Netherlands, Malaysia and other countries for establishment of United Nations tribunal to prosecute those responsible for shooting down of Malaysia Airlines flight in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: A senior Russian official rejected calls Friday for the establishment of a United Nations tribunal to try those responsible for shooting down a Malaysia Airlines flight in eastern Ukraine last year.

headline.main: Russia: Diplomat Rejects U.N. Tribunal on Malaysian Jet Shot Down in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Diplomat Rejects U.N. Tribunal on Malaysian Jet Shot Down in Ukraine

snippet: A senior Russian official rejected calls Friday for the establishment of a United Nations tribunal to try those responsible for shooting down a Malaysia Airlines flight in eastern Ukraine last year.
